jhave.client
Class QuizInfo

java.lang.Object
  jhave.client.QuizInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, jhave.core.TransactionCodes, jhave.event.QuestionListener
public class QuizInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements jhave.event.QuestionListener, jhave.core.TransactionCodes

This class stores data for quizzes and formats them as an XML string.

Author:
Adam Klein

sendResults

public void sendResults()
Uses a reference to the network controller to transmit the quiz results to the server.

sendResults

public void sendResults(int numStepsCorrect,
                        int numSteps)
Uses a reference to the network controller to transmit the quiz results to the server. This version is used for Visualizers like Matrix, which are based on number of steps done correctly in the student-simulated simulation of algorithm. It could also be used in a situation where the student exits before completing the quiz and you want to assign a "0 correct out of 1" score.
